text: Emi? Ya'akhub ku maranam samipincinappudu, miru akkada unnara?" Appudatanu tana kumarulato: "Na taruvata miru evarini aradhistaru?" Ani adiginappudu. Varannaru: "Ni aradhyadaivam mariyu ni purvikulagu ibrahim, ismayil mariyu is'hakh la aradhyadaivamaina a ekaika devunni (allah ne) memu aradhistamu mariyu memu ayanake vidheyulamai (muslinlamai) untamu
